body:
The title says it all. To me, the most annoying thing on Avicus is by far, when people block the monument with blocks. PEOPLE IT DOESNT WORK! IT NEVER WORKS!

Anyways what are your guys most annoying moments?

title: Annoying Moments?

replies.body: When the monument lags back. Or any block for that matter .-.

x-x

replies.body: For me is when u destry a monument, and the break block, didnt get destroyed. I lose for that many several times.

replies.body:
You bridge to a monument and your teammate is right behind you. You finish the bridge and you start mining, but once the obsidian breaks you figure out your teammate broke it and finished the game or you both die afterwards.
Short Form: You do all the work and your teammate benefits from it
